answers.answer: Hi,thanks for the query,Yes if DKA and its cause is well controlled you can always plan Lantus maintenance. Advantage being it has no peak action with it, therefore chances of getting HYPOGLYCEMIC ( LOW BLOOD SUGAR STAE ) is less.Wish you good health.
